title: The Mighty Ducks Are Back and They’re Still Fun
description:
Danny Heifetz and Megan Schuster discuss 'Mighty Ducks: Game Changers' on Disney +. They discuss what it’s like having the series return 20-plus years later, and how it is different from the movies.

Hosts: Danny Heifetz and Megan Schuster
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
